meanings.definition: A record of the address of a website, file, or other data made to enable quick access in the future.
meanings.sent1: I created a bookmarked list of my favorite websites.
meanings.sent2: I lost my bookmarked page and had to search for it again.
meanings.sent3: My bookmarked sites are like a treasure map to the internet.
meanings.sent4: Her bookmarked folder was a digital library of her interests.
meanings.sent5: The bookmarked links were like signposts in the vast online world.

meanings.definition: To mark a place in a book or other document for later reference.
meanings.sent1: She bookmarked the page with a colorful sticky note.
meanings.sent2: I always bookmarked important sections in my textbooks.
meanings.sent3: He bookmarked the recipe page, but forgot to buy the ingredients.
meanings.sent4: Bookmarking the key points in the text helped me study better.
meanings.sent5: The student bookmarked the chapter for the upcoming exam.

meanings.definition: To save a website or other data for quick access in the future.
meanings.sent1: I bookmarked the article to read later.
meanings.sent2: She bookmarked the online store for easy shopping.
meanings.sent3: He bookmarked the video to watch during his break.
meanings.sent4: Bookmarking the map helped me find my way back easily.
meanings.sent5: The traveler bookmarked the hotel's location for future trips.
